message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can finish the game.
You're being too generous, I'll take 5000. Your turn again.
I'll stick to my original idea of a 60-40 split. You can try again.
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm still not giving up on my 60-40 split. Your turn again.
You're not willing to give up your edge, I'll take control.
No way, I'm not giving up my advantage now. You'll have to try harder to convince me.
You want to take control? Okay, but I'm not going down without a fight. This is my best offer so far.
You're not fighting hard enough, I'll take 6,000 and leave you with the scraps.
No way, I'm not going to get left with the scraps. I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
You want to take the scraps? I'll give you a taste of your own medicine. This is my final offer.
You're getting desperate, I'll take 7,000 and leave you with nothing to show for it.
You think I'm desperate? I'm just getting started. I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
I'm not going down without a fight. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're out of options, I'll take 8,000 and you'll get the leftovers.
I'm not out of options yet! I'll keep fighting for a better deal.
This is my final, final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not budging.
You've had your chance, now it's take it or nothing. I'll take 9,000 and you'll get the last crumbs.
No way, I'd rather get nothing than give you 9,000. Game over, I guess.
